express_delivery.delivery_time: Links Premium dostava: isti dan za narudžbe do 13:00h (pon-pet) za područje Zagreba. Wolt Express dostava: narudžbe do 18:00h (pon-pet) i do 12:00h (vikend) u 12 gradova.
express_delivery.pricing: Links Premium dostava (do 30 kg): 10,00 - 15,00 €. Wolt Express dostava: 5,99 €.

weekend_delivery.days: Dostupno putem Wolt Express dostave, narudžbe do 12:00 h vikendom.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena ovisi o težini paketa i kreće se od 10,00 € do 150,00 €.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Da bi tvoja narudžba bila dostavljena isti dan, potrebno ju je naručiti do 13:00 h od ponedjeljka do petka. Narudžbe zaprimljene vikendom dostavljamo prvi radni dan, a usluga ovisi o dostupnosti proizvoda na skladištu.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Dostupno u 12 gradova gdje postoje poslovnice.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Links.hr provides nationwide home delivery in Croatia via GLS, Overseas, and DPD for 5,99 € (3-5 days), and bulky item delivery via Milšped for 10€-150€ (5-7 days). Parcel locker delivery is offered through BOX NOW and GLS for 3,99 €. In-store pickup is available in 12 cities.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store offers multiple express services. 'Links Premium' provides same-day delivery in the Zagreb area for both standard (10-15€) and bulky (50€) items. 'Wolt Express' offers fast delivery, including on weekends, in 12 cities for 5,99 €.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a single, well-structured page, making it easy to understand the different services. However, details regarding island surcharges, free shipping thresholds, and cash-on-delivery fees are not mentioned.
